bug.author: AnanthHari
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
I am using the latest nightly wheel: Downloaded on May 21 at 10 pm EDT. Ray version: 0.9.0.dev0 Python version: 3.7.6 OS: Ubuntu 19.10 There are three tests present in ray/rllib/agents/dqn/tests directory on the master branch. In the latest nightly wheel, the directory itself is absent. We can see that the earliest commit in occurs on Feb 10, 2020: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/commits/master/rllib/agents/dqn/tests>https://github.com/ray-project/ray/commits/master/rllib/agents/dqn/tests</denchmark-link>
Is there a regularly updated version that contains all of the latest commits? I would like to not miss the improvements/bug fixes that were made during the past several months. Thank you!

comments.comment: We don't include the test packages. Please reopen if you can confirm via the code that the wheel is really out of date.
